fullDescription.intro: Gives in the i-th iteration step the i-th element of the URI list from k-th inpot port at the k-th output port.
fullDescription.option: If reuse is activated the loop will only iterate over the list at the 1st input port and the remaining ports will be passed through completely in each iteration of the loop.

ports.outPort: i-th URI from port 0 in i-th iteration
i-th URI from port 1 in i-th iteration (optional)
i-th URI from port 2 in i-th iteration (optional)
i-th URI from port 3 in i-th iteration (optional)
